shortInfo.description: Cookies are small files which are stored on your computer. They are used to hold data specific to a particular browser and website, and can be accessed either by the web server or your computer. They

shortInfo.title: JavaScript
shortInfo.description: JavaScript is a programing language used extensively in the creation of websites. How to update settings Warning: disabling JavaScript can interfere with the functionality of most modern websites.

shortInfo.title: Ad Blocker
shortInfo.description: An Ad Blocker is a content filtering browser extension designed to filter out advertisements from rendering within your browser. Whilst useful, Ad Blockers can some times interfere with a websites

shortInfo.title: Screen Settings
shortInfo.description: Modern displays allow for a multitude of calibration options, from your screens resolution, to the number of colors it will render. The calibration of these can effect your browsing experience.
